data.name: 3tene
data.detailed_description:
It is an application made for the person who aims for virtual youtube from now on easily for easy handling.
If there is a web camera, it blinks with face recognition, the direction of the face. You can project from microphone to lip sync (interlocking of lip movement) avatar.
You can also change your avatar by changing expressions and poses without a web camera.
It corresponds to VRM of 3D avatar format format for VR proposed by Dwango.
Recording function, screenshot shooting function, blue background for chromakey synthesis, background effects, effect design and all necessary functions are included.

data.short_description: It is an application made for the person who aims for virtual youtube from now on easily for easy handling. If there is a web camera, it blinks with face recognition, the direction of the face. You can project from microphone to lip sync (interlocking of lip movement) avatar.
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
data.reviews:
“掲載動画や画像に「東北ずん子」を起用しているのは、開発元であるプラスプラスが岩手県の企業であることに由来する。「東北ずん子」はVRM形式のモデルも無料配信しているため、どんなアプリか確かめる際に利用してみると良いかもしれない。”
株式会社パノラプロ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP+ 64 bits or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 third generation or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes: 480p Webcam with Mic
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP+ 64 bits or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 series
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes: 480p Webcam with Mic
